verses.verse: To every thing there is a <S%H2165>season<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to every <S%H2656>purpose<s%> under the <S%H8064>heaven<s%>:

A <S%H6256>time<s%> to be <S%H3205>born<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H4191>die<s%>; a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H5193>plant<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to pluck <S%H6131>up<s%> that which is <S%H5193>planted<s%>; to be: Heb. to bear
A <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H2026>kill<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H7495>heal<s%>; a <S%H6256>time<s%> to break <S%H6555>down<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to build <S%H1129>up<s%>;
A <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H1058>weep<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H7832>laugh<s%>; a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H5594>mourn<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H7540>dance<s%>;

A <S%H6256>time<s%> to cast <S%H7993>away<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H3664>gather<s%> <S%H68>stones<s%> <S%H3664>together<s%>; a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H2263>embrace<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H7368>refrain<s%> from <S%H2263>embracing<s%>; to refrain from: Heb. to be far from
A <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H1245>get<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H6>lose<s%>; a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H8104>keep<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to cast <S%H7993>away<s%>; get: or, seek
A <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H7167>rend<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H8609>sew<s%>; a <S%H6256>time<s%> to keep <S%H2814>silence<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%>;
A <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H157>love<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> to <S%H8130>hate<s%>; a <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%>, and a <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%>.
What <S%H3504>profit<s%> hath he that <S%H6213>worketh<s%> in that <S%H834>wherein<s%> he <S%H6001>laboureth<s%>?
I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H6045>travail<s%>, which <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> to be <S%H6031>exercised<s%> in it.

He hath <S%H6213>made<s%> every thing <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> in his <S%H6256>time<s%>: also he hath <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H5769>world<s%> in their <S%H3820>heart<s%>, so <S%H1097>that<s%> no <S%H120>man<s%> can find <S%H4672>out<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>maketh<s%> from the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> to the <S%H5490>end<s%>.
I <S%H3045>know<s%> that there is no <S%H2896>good<s%> in them, but for a man to <S%H8055>rejoice<s%>, and to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> in his <S%H2416>life<s%>.

And also that every <S%H120>man<s%> should <S%H398>eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink<s%>, and <S%H7200>enjoy<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> of all his <S%H5999>labour<s%>, it is the <S%H4991>gift<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.

I <S%H3045>know<s%> that, whatsoever <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>doeth<s%>, it shall be for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: <S%H369>nothing<s%> can be <S%H3254>put<s%> to it, nor any thing <S%H1639>taken<s%> from it: and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6213>doeth<s%> it, that men should <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

That which hath been is <S%H3528>now<s%>; and that which is to be hath <S%H3528>already<s%> been; and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1245>requireth<s%> that which is <S%H7291>past<s%>. that which is past: Heb. that which is driven away

And moreover I <S%H7200>saw<s%> under the <S%H8121>sun<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, that <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> was there; and the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>, that <S%H7562>iniquity<s%> was there.

I <S%H559>said<s%> in mine <S%H3820>heart<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> and the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>: for there is a <S%H6256>time<s%> there for every <S%H2656>purpose<s%> and for every <S%H4639>work<s%>.

I <S%H559>said<s%> in mine <S%H3820>heart<s%> concerning the <S%H1700>estate<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>, that <S%H430>God<s%> might <S%H1305>manifest<s%> them, and that they might <S%H7200>see<s%> that <S%H1992>they<s%> themselves are <S%H929>beasts<s%>. that God: or, that they might clear God, and see, etc

For that which <S%H4745>befalleth<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H4745>befalleth<s%> <S%H929>beasts<s%>; even one <S%H259>thing<s%> <S%H4745>befalleth<s%> them: as the one <S%H4194>dieth<s%>, so <S%H4194>dieth<s%> the <S%H2088>other<s%>; yea, they have all <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7307>breath<s%>; so that a <S%H120>man<s%> hath no <S%H4195>preeminence<s%> above a <S%H929>beast<s%>: for all is <S%H1892>vanity<s%>.
All <S%H1980>go<s%> unto <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>; all are of the <S%H6083>dust<s%>, and all <S%H7725>turn<s%> to <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%>.

Who <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H1121>man<s%> <S%H120><s%> that <S%H5927>goeth<s%> <S%H4605>upward<s%>, and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H929>beast<s%> that <S%H3381>goeth<s%> <S%H4295>downward<s%> to the <S%H776>earth<s%>? of man: Heb. of the sons of man goeth upward: Heb. is ascending, etc

Wherefore I <S%H7200>perceive<s%> that there is nothing <S%H2896>better<s%>, than that a <S%H120>man<s%> should <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in his own <S%H4639>works<s%>; for that is his <S%H2506>portion<s%>: for who shall <S%H935>bring<s%> him to <S%H7200>see<s%> what shall be <S%H310>after<s%> him?
